 * @brief Exercise 1.14: Compare and contrast the loops that used a for with those using a while. Are there advantages
 * or disadvantages to using either form?
 * @date 2024-03-14
 *

 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * for : does initialises, condition evalution, increamentation in one single statement, so missing incrementation or decrementation of counter
 *       is avoided, in while loop it is often the case, which results in infinite loop
 * while : is less verbose so easy to read and understand, if counter is already initialised.
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/
